<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Admin Dashboard - User Management</title>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <script src="./js/admin-config.js" defer></script>

    <div class="flex h-screen overflow-hidden">
        <!-- Sidebar -->
        <aside class="bg-indigo-800 text-white w-64 flex-shrink-0 hidden md:block">
            <div class="p-4">

                <div class="container mx-auto">

                    <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6 mb-6">
                        <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row md:items-center md:justify-between mb-6">
                            <div class="mb-4 md:mb-0">
                                <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold">All Users</h2>

                                    </button>

                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="flex flex-wrap items-center gap-3 mb-6">
                            <div class="flex items-center">
                                <span class="text-sm text-gray-500 mr-2">Role:</span>
                                <select class="border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-1 text-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                                    <option value="all">All Roles</option>
                                    <option value="admin">Admin</option>
                                    <option value="editor">Editor</option>
                                    <option value="subscriber">Subscriber</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                            <div class="flex items-center">
                                <span class="text-sm text-gray-500 mr-2">Status:</span>

                                    <option value="inactive">Inactive</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <button class="text-red-600 hover:text-red-900"><i class="fas fa-trash-alt"></i></button>
                                        </td>
                                    </tr>
                                </tbody>
                            </table>
                        </div>
                        
                        <!-- Bulk Actions -->
                        <div class="flex flex-wrap items-center gap-3 mt-4 border-t pt-4">

                                <span class="text-sm text-gray-500 mr-2">Bulk Actions:</span>
                                <select class="border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-1 text-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500">
                                    <option value="">Select Action</option>
                                    <option value="activate">Activate</option>
                                    <option value="deactivate">Deactivate</option>
                                    <option value="delete">Delete</option>
                                </select>
                                <button class="ml-2 bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300 text-gray-700 px-3 py-1 rounded-lg text-sm">Apply</button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <!-- Pagination -->
                        <div class="flex items-center justify-between border-t border-gray-200 px-4 py-3 sm:px-6 mt-4">
                            <div class="hidden sm:flex sm:flex-1 sm:items-center sm:justify-between">
                                <div>
                                    <p class="text-sm text-gray-700">
                                        Showing <span class="font-medium">1</span> to <span class="font-medium">3</span> of <span class="font-medium">3</span> users
                                    </p>
                                </div>
                                <div>
                                    <nav class="relative z-0 inline-flex rounded-md shadow-sm -space-x-px" aria-label="Pagination">
                                        <a href="#" class="relative inline-flex items-center px-2 py-2 rounded-l-md border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50">
                                            <span class="sr-only">Previous</span>
                                            <i class="fas fa-chevron-left"></i>
                                        </a>
                                        <a href="#" class="relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 bg-indigo-50 text-sm font-medium text-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-100">1</a>
                                        <a href="#" class="relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50">2</a>
                                        <a href="#" class="relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50">3</a>
                                        <span class="relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">...</span>
                                        <a href="#" class="relative inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50">7</a>
                                        <a href="#" class="relative inline-flex items-center px-2 py-2 rounded-r-md border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50">
                                            <span class="sr-only">Next</span>
                                            <i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i>
                                        </a>
                                    </nav>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </main>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        document.querySelector('button#mobile-menu-button').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const sidebar = document.querySelector('aside');
            sidebar.classList.toggle('hidden');
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

================
File: html_mockup/src/view/blogowner/BlogOwnerDetail.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Rejserin - Medium</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

    <script src="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_project/html_mockup/src/js/components.js" defer></script>
    <link href="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_projecthtml_mockup/src/js/components.js" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body class="font-serif bg-[#f5f5f5] text-gray-900">
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <div id="navbar-user"></div>

    <!-- Profile Header Section -->
    <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8">
        <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center md:items-start gap-6">
            <!-- Profile Image -->
            <div class="w-24 h-24 md:w-32 md:h-32 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
                <img src="https://via.placeholder.com/300x300" alt="Rejserin Profile" class="w-full h-full object-cover">
            </div>
            
            <!-- Profile Info -->
            <div class="flex flex-col items-center md:items-start">
                <h1 class="text-3xl font-bold mb-2">Rejserin</h1>

                <p class="text-gray-700 text-center md:text-left max-w-2xl mb-4">
                    Writer and researcher passionate about technology and its impact on society. 
                    Writing about UX, product design, and digital innovation.
                </p>
                <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
                    <!-- <a href="#" class="bg-black text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-800">Follow</a> -->
                    <a href="#" class="border border-gray-300 px-4 py-2 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-50">Email</a>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Content Navigation -->
    <div class="border-b border-gray-200">
        <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
            <nav class="flex overflow-x-auto">
                <a href="#" class="font-medium text-gray-900 whitespace-nowrap px-4 py-4 border-b-2 border-black">List of posts</a>
                <!-- only exitst when blog owner login they own -->
                <a href="#" class="font-medium text-gray-500 whitespace-nowrap px-4 py-4 hover:text-gray-900">New Post</a>  
            </nav>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Main Content Section -->
    <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8">
        <div class="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-8">
            <!-- Articles Column -->
            <div class="w-full lg:w-2/3">
                
                <!-- Article 1 -->
                <div class="mb-12 pb-12 border-b border-gray-200">
                    <div class="flex items-center mb-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span>Apr 8, 2023</span>
                        <span class="mx-1">·</span>
                        <span>5 min read</span>
                    </div>
                    <h2 class="text-xl font-bold mb-2">The Psychology Behind Effective Call-to-Actions</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-700 mb-4">
                        Understanding human psychology can dramatically improve conversion rates. Here's how to craft 
                        CTAs that drive user engagement.
                    </p>
                    <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4">
                        <span class="bg-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm text-gray-700">Marketing</span>
                        <span class="bg-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm text-gray-700">Psychology</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="flex items-center justify-between">
                        <div class="flex items-center space-x-4">
                            <button class="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-700">
                                <i class="far fa-comment"></i>
                                <span class="ml-1">14</span>
                            </button>
                        </div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <!-- Regular Article 2 -->
                <div class="mb-12 pb-12 border-b border-gray-200">
                    <div class="flex items-center mb-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <span>Mar 22, 2023</span>
                        <span class="mx-1">·</span>
                        <span>7 min read</span>
                    </div>
                    <h2 class="text-xl font-bold mb-2">Accessibility in Web Design: More Than Just Compliance</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-700 mb-4">
                        Creating truly inclusive digital experiences requires going beyond minimum standards. 
                        Here's how to build products everyone can use and enjoy.
                    </p>
                    <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4">
                        <span class="bg-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm text-gray-700">Accessibility</span>
                        <span class="bg-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm text-gray-700">Web Design</span>
                        <span class="bg-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm text-gray-700">Inclusion</span>
                    </div>

                            </button>
                        </div>

                    </div>

================
File: html_mockup/src/view/blogowner/CreatePost.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Create New Post - Medium</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

    <script src="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_project/html_mockup/src/js/components.js" defer></script>
    <link href="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_project/html_mockup/src/js/components.js" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body class="font-serif bg-[#f5f5f5] text-gray-900">
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <div id="navbar-owner"></div>

    <!-- Create Post Header -->
    <div class="bg-[#f5f5f5] py-8 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
        <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Create a New Post</h1>
            <p class="text-xl text-gray-700">Share your ideas with millions of readers.</p>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Create Post Form -->
    <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8">
        <form class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm p-6">
            <!-- Post Title -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="post-title" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Title</label>
                <input type="text" id="post-title" name="post-title" placeholder="Enter your post title" 
                    class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black">
            </div>

            <!-- Post Category -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="post-category" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Category</label>
                <select id="post-category" name="post-category" 
                    class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black">
                    <option value="">Select a category</option>
                    <option value="programming">Programming</option>
                    <option value="data-science">Data Science</option>
                    <option value="technology">Technology</option>
                    <option value="self-improvement">Self Improvement</option>
                    <option value="writing">Writing</option>
                    <option value="psychology">Psychology</option>
                    <option value="creativity">Creativity</option>
                    <option value="health">Health</option>
                    <option value="politics">Politics</option>
                </select>
            </div>

            <!-- Post Tags -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="post-tags" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Tags (comma separated)</label>
                <input type="text" id="post-tags" name="post-tags" placeholder="e.g., javascript, webdev, beginners" 
                    class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black">
            </div>

            <!-- Featured Image -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="featured-image" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Featured Image</label>
                <div class="flex items-center justify-center w-full">
                    <label for="featured-image-upload" class="flex flex-col items-center justify-center w-full h-64 border-2 border-gray-300 border-dashed rounded-lg cursor-pointer bg-gray-50 hover:bg-gray-100">
                        <div class="flex flex-col items-center justify-center pt-5 pb-6">
                            <svg class="w-10 h-10 mb-3 text-gray-400" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 16a4 4 0 01-.88-7.903A5 5 0 1115.9 6L16 6a5 5 0 011 9.9M15 13l-3-3m0 0l-3 3m3-3v12"></path>
                            </svg>
                            <p class="mb-2 text-sm text-gray-500"><span class="font-semibold">Click to upload</span> or drag and drop</p>
                            <p class="text-xs text-gray-500">PNG, JPG or GIF (MAX. 2MB)</p>
                        </div>
                        <input id="featured-image-upload" type="file" class="hidden" accept="image/*" />
                    </label>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- WYSIWYG Editor Toolbar -->
            <div class="mb-2">
                <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-2 p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-t-lg bg-gray-50">
                    <button type="button" data-command="bold" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-bold"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="italic" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-italic"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="underline" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-underline"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="strikeThrough" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-strikethrough"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyLeft" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-left"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyCenter" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-center"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyRight" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-right"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyFull" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-justify"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="insertUnorderedList" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-list-ul"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="insertOrderedList" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-list-ol"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="createLink" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-link"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="unlink" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-unlink"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="h1" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded font-bold">
                        H1
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="h2" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded font-bold">
                        H2
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="h3" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded font-bold">
                        H3
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="undo" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-undo"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="redo" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-redo"></i>
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- WYSIWYG Content Area -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <div id="editor" contenteditable="true" 
                    class="w-full min-h-[400px] p-4 border border-gray-300 rounded-b-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black"></div>
                <textarea id="editor-content" name="content" class="hidden"></textarea>
            </div>

            <!-- Buttons -->
            <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-4 justify-end">
                <button type="button" class="px-6 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-100">
                    Save as Draft
                </button>
                <button type="submit" class="px-6 py-2 bg-black text-white rounded-full hover:bg-gray-800">
                    Publish Post
                </button>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div id="footer"></div>

    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        document.getElementById('mobile-menu-button').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');
            menu.classList.toggle('hidden');    
        });

        // Simple WYSIWYG editor functionality
        const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.editor-btn');
        const editor = document.getElementById('editor');
        const hiddenInput = document.getElementById('editor-content');

        buttons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const command = this.dataset.command;
                
                if (command === 'createLink') {
                    const url = prompt('Enter the link URL:');
                    if (url) document.execCommand(command, false, url);
                } else if (command === 'h1' || command === 'h2' || command === 'h3') {
                    document.execCommand('formatBlock', false, command);
                } else {
                    document.execCommand(command, false, null);
                }
                
                // Update hidden textarea with content
                hiddenInput.value = editor.innerHTML;
            });
        });

        // Update hidden textarea on form submission
        document.querySelector('form').addEventListener('submit', function() {
            hiddenInput.value = editor.innerHTML;
        });
        
        // Display uploaded image
        document.getElementById('featured-image-upload').addEventListener('change', function(e) {
            const file = e.target.files[0];
            if (file) {
                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.onload = function(e) {
                    const parent = document.querySelector('label[for="featured-image-upload"]');
                    parent.innerHTML = `<img src="${e.target.result}" alt="Featured image" class="h-full w-full object-cover rounded-lg">`;
                }
                reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

================
File: html_mockup/src/view/blogowner/UpdatePost.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Update Post - Medium</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <script src="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_project/html_mockup/src/js/components.js" defer></script>
    <link href="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_project/html_mockup/src/js/components.js" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body class="font-serif bg-[#f5f5f5] text-gray-900">
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <div id="navbar-owner"></div>

    <!-- Update Post Header -->
    <div class="bg-[#f5f5f5] py-8 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
        <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Update Your Post</h1>
            <p class="text-xl text-gray-700">Refine your ideas and keep your content fresh.</p>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Update Post Form -->
    <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8">
        <form class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm p-6">
            <!-- Post Title -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="post-title" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Title</label>
                <input type="text" id="post-title" name="post-title" value="Your existing post title here" 
                    class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black">
            </div>

            <!-- Post Category -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="post-category" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Category</label>
                <select id="post-category" name="post-category" 
                    class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black">
                    <option value="">Select a category</option>
                    <option value="programming" selected>Programming</option>
                    <option value="data-science">Data Science</option>
                    <option value="technology">Technology</option>
                    <option value="self-improvement">Self Improvement</option>
                    <option value="writing">Writing</option>
                    <option value="psychology">Psychology</option>
                    <option value="creativity">Creativity</option>
                    <option value="health">Health</option>
                    <option value="politics">Politics</option>
                </select>
            </div>

            <!-- Post Tags -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="post-tags" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Tags (comma separated)</label>
                <input type="text" id="post-tags" name="post-tags" value="javascript, webdev, tutorial" 
                    class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black">
            </div>

            <!-- Featured Image -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <label for="featured-image" class="block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2">Featured Image</label>
                <div class="flex items-center justify-center w-full">
                    <label for="featured-image-upload" class="flex flex-col items-center justify-center w-full h-64 border-2 border-gray-300 border-dashed rounded-lg cursor-pointer bg-gray-50 hover:bg-gray-100">
                        <img id="current-featured-image" src="https://via.placeholder.com/800x400" alt="Current featured image" class="h-full w-full object-cover rounded-lg">
                    </label>
                </div>
                <div class="mt-2 flex justify-end">
                    <label for="featured-image-upload" class="text-sm text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 cursor-pointer">
                        Change image
                        <input id="featured-image-upload" type="file" class="hidden" accept="image/*" />
                    </label>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- WYSIWYG Editor Toolbar -->
            <div class="mb-2">
                <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-2 p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-t-lg bg-gray-50">
                    <button type="button" data-command="bold" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-bold"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="italic" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-italic"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="underline" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-underline"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="strikeThrough" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-strikethrough"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyLeft" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-left"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyCenter" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-center"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyRight" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-right"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="justifyFull" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-align-justify"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="insertUnorderedList" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-list-ul"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="insertOrderedList" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-list-ol"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="createLink" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-link"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="unlink" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-unlink"></i>
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="h1" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded font-bold">
                        H1
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="h2" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded font-bold">
                        H2
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="h3" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded font-bold">
                        H3
                    </button>
                    <span class="border-r border-gray-300 h-6 my-auto mx-2"></span>
                    <button type="button" data-command="undo" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-undo"></i>
                    </button>
                    <button type="button" data-command="redo" class="editor-btn p-2 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded">
                        <i class="fas fa-redo"></i>
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- WYSIWYG Content Area -->
            <div class="mb-6">
                <div id="editor" contenteditable="true" 
                    class="w-full min-h-[400px] p-4 border border-gray-300 rounded-b-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black">
                    <h2>Your existing post content</h2>
                    <p>This is where the existing content of your post will appear for editing. All formatting, images, and other elements will be preserved exactly as they were when you published the post.</p>
                    <p>You can edit this content just like you would when creating a new post. All the editing tools above are available for use.</p>
                </div>
                <textarea id="editor-content" name="content" class="hidden"></textarea>
            </div>

            <!-- Post Status & Version History -->
            <div class="mb-6 p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
                <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between items-start sm:items-center">
                    <div>
                        <span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Status: </span>
                        <span class="text-sm text-green-600 font-medium">Published</span>
                        <span class="text-xs text-gray-500 ml-2">Published on Apr 15, 2023</span>
                    </div>
                    <button type="button" class="mt-2 sm:mt-0 text-sm text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800">
                        View version history
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Buttons -->
            <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-4 justify-between">
                <button type="button" id="delete-post-btn" class="px-6 py-2 border border-red-500 text-red-500 rounded-full hover:bg-red-50">
                    Delete Post
                </button>
                <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-4">
                    <button type="button" class="px-6 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-100">
                        Save as Draft
                    </button>
                    <button type="submit" class="px-6 py-2 bg-black text-white rounded-full hover:bg-gray-800">
                        Update Post
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>

    <!-- Delete Confirmation Modal -->
    <div id="delete-modal" class="fixed inset-0 bg-gray-500 bg-opacity-75 flex items-center justify-center z-50 hidden">
        <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-md w-full">
            <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4">Delete Post</h3>
            <p class="mb-6">Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.</p>
            <div class="flex justify-end space-x-4">
                <button id="cancel-delete" class="px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-100">
                    Cancel
                </button>
                <button id="confirm-delete" class="px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-red-700">
                    Delete
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div id="footer"></div>

    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        document.getElementById('mobile-menu-button').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const menu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');
            menu.classList.toggle('hidden');    
        });

        // Simple WYSIWYG editor functionality
        const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.editor-btn');
        const editor = document.getElementById('editor');
        const hiddenInput = document.getElementById('editor-content');

        buttons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const command = this.dataset.command;
                
                if (command === 'createLink') {
                    const url = prompt('Enter the link URL:');
                    if (url) document.execCommand(command, false, url);
                } else if (command === 'h1' || command === 'h2' || command === 'h3') {
                    document.execCommand('formatBlock', false, command);
                } else {
                    document.execCommand(command, false, null);
                }
                
                // Update hidden textarea with content
                hiddenInput.value = editor.innerHTML;
            });
        });

        // Update hidden textarea on form submission
        document.querySelector('form').addEventListener('submit', function() {
            hiddenInput.value = editor.innerHTML;
        });
        
        // Display uploaded image
        document.getElementById('featured-image-upload').addEventListener('change', function(e) {
            const file = e.target.files[0];
            if (file) {
                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.onload = function(e) {
                    document.getElementById('current-featured-image').src = e.target.result;
                }
                reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            }
        });

        // Delete post confirmation
        document.getElementById('delete-post-btn').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.getElementById('delete-modal').classList.remove('hidden');
        });

        document.getElementById('cancel-delete').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.getElementById('delete-modal').classList.add('hidden');
        });

        document.getElementById('confirm-delete').addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Add code here to handle the actual deletion of the post
            alert('Post deleted');
            document.getElementById('delete-modal').classList.add('hidden');
        });

        // Initialize content on page load
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // In a real application, you would fetch the post data from an API
            // and populate the form fields
            hiddenInput.value = editor.innerHTML;
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

================
File: html_mockup/src/view/user/User.html
================
<!-- res -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hoang Chi Thanh - Medium</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">

    <script src="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_project/html_mockup/src/js/components.js" defer></script>
    <link href="https://thanhchiyeukurumi.github.io/intern_project/html_mockup/src/js/components.js" rel="stylesheet">
<body class="font-serif bg-[#f5f5f5] text-gray-900">
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <div id="navbar-user"></div>

    <!-- User Profile Header -->
    <div class="bg-[#f5f5f5] py-12 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
        <div class="max-w-5xl mx-auto">
            <div class="flex flex-col items-center md:flex-row md:items-start">
                <div class="md:mr-8 mb-6 md:mb-0">
                    <img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Profile Picture" class="w-36 h-36 rounded-full">
                </div>
                <div class="text-center md:text-left">
                    <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold mb-2">Hoang Chi Thanh</h1>
                    <p class="text-xl text-gray-700 mb-6">What the hell is going on?????????</p>

                        <div class="flex items-center text-gray-700">
                            <i class="fas fa-newspaper mr-2"></i>
                            <span>42 Comment</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                        Lmao it to hard
                    </p>

                        <a href="#" class="px-4 py-2 bg-black text-white rounded-full hover:bg-gray-800">Edit Profile</a>
                        <a href="#" class="px-4 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-full hover:bg-gray-50">Share Profile</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- User Content Navigation -->
    <div class="border-b border-gray-200">
        <div class="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
            <nav class="flex overflow-x-auto">
                <a href="#" class="px-4 py-4 text-black border-b-2 border-black font-medium mr-8 whitespace-nowrap">Comments</a>
                <!-- <a href="#" class="px-4 py-4 text-gray-500 hover:text-black mr-8 whitespace-nowrap">Stories</a>

                <a href="#" class="px-4 py-4 text-gray-500 hover:text-black whitespace-nowrap">About</a> -->
            </nav>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Comments Section -->
    <div class="max-w-5xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-12">
        <h2 class="text-2xl font-bold mb-8">Your Comments</h2>
        
        <!-- Comment Card 1 -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow mb-8 p-6">
            <div class="flex items-start mb-4">
                <div class="flex-shrink-0 mr-4">
                    <img src="https://via.placeholder.com/50" alt="Article Image" class="w-14 h-14 object-cover rounded">
                </div>
                <div>
                    <h3 class="font-bold text-lg mb-1">
                        <a href="#" class="hover:underline">The Future of Web Development: What to Expect in 2025</a>
                    </h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-500 text-sm">By James Wilson · May 15, 2025</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="ml-0 sm:ml-18">
                <p class="text-gray-800 mb-4">
                    This article resonates deeply with me. The predictions about WebAssembly are spot on. 
                    I've been using it in my recent projects and the performance gains are substantial. 
                    Great insights about the future of web development!
                </p>
                <div class="flex items-center text-gray-500 text-sm">
                    <span>Apr 22, 2025</span>
                    <span class="mx-2">·</span>
                    <button class="hover:text-black">Edit</button>
                    <span class="mx-2">·</span>
                    <button class="hover:text-black">Delete</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <!-- Comment Card 2 -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow mb-8 p-6">
            <div class="flex items-start mb-4">
                <div class="flex-shrink-0 mr-4">
                    <img src="https://via.placeholder.com/50" alt="Article Image" class="w-14 h-14 object-cover rounded">
                </div>
                <div>
                    <h3 class="font-bold text-lg mb-1">
                        <a href="#" class="hover:underline">Machine Learning in Healthcare: Real-World Applications</a>
                    </h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-500 text-sm">By Sarah Chen · April 8, 2025</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="ml-0 sm:ml-18">
                <p class="text-gray-800 mb-4">
                    I work in healthcare IT and can confirm these trends are becoming mainstream. 
                    We've implemented similar ML models for early disease detection. The accuracy rates 
                    mentioned here match our experience. Would love to see more about implementation challenges.
                </p>
                <div class="flex items-center text-gray-500 text-sm">
                    <span>Apr 10, 2025</span>
                    <span class="mx-2">·</span>

                    <span class="mx-2">·</span>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

                Load More Comments
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div id="footer"></div>
</body>

================
File: package.json
================
{
  "name": "frontend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "dependencies": {
    "@tailwindcss/cli": "^4.0.14",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.21",
    "postcss": "^8.5.3",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.0.14"
  }
}

================
File: postcss.config.js
================
module.exports = {
    plugins: {
      tailwindcss: {},
      autoprefixer: {},
    },
  }

File: tailwind.config.js

    content: [
      './src/**/*.{html,js}',
    ],
    theme: {
      extend: {},
    },
    plugins: [],
  }
